WorkItem.Description: I set this flag on one configuration element collection and after that there was no IntelliSense functionality (no error messages, no highlighting) for any part of the config file.
WorkItem.Summary: Setting has custom child elements disables all schema checking

Comments.Message: Here is the problem. When this flag is set, we are forced to generate a schema that is ambiguous (because of unknown child elements). An ambiguous schema will prevent intellisense from working. Unfortunately, I don't see a way around this at the moment without some very clever (and possibly complex) development work.
I'm leaving this active for now, in case someone has a clever way to get around this. A warning should probably be added to inform users in the future.

Added warning about this in the tool.

** Closed by andym1978 9/12/2014 1:03 PM
Warning msg is checked in to TFS. Will close once it is deployed as download package and confirmed.
